title: Rebrand application to Narie with floral elegance theme

requirements.summary: Update application name to 'Narie' throughout the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation shows 'Narie' as the brand name
All references to 'Clothing Store' are replaced with 'Narie'

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag to 'Narie' and ensure any meta tags reference the new brand name.
Replace the brand name in the header navigation from 'Clothing Store' to 'Narie'. Update any text content that displays the application name to ensure consistent branding.

requirements.summary: Add 'Elegance in Floral' motto as a visible tagline
acceptanceCriteria: The tagline 'Elegance in Floral' appears on the homepage
The typography and placement complement the brand identity
The tagline is styled with elegant, refined typography

file_operations.description: Add the motto 'Elegance in Floral' as a tagline near the brand name in the header. Style it with elegant, refined typography using a complementary font size and color that aligns with the floral elegance theme.
Include the tagline 'Elegance in Floral' in the hero section, positioned elegantly beneath or near the main heading. Apply typography that conveys botanical sophistication.

requirements.summary: Integrate Narie brand logo images with gold floral emblem and teal accent
acceptanceCriteria: The Narie logo with floral emblem appears in the header navigation
The favicon uses the Narie brand logo
The logo maintains its elegant gold and teal color scheme
Logo images are properly sized and optimized for web display

file_operations.description: Copy the uploaded brand logo image (featuring the decorative gold floral emblem with teal accent and 'NARIE' text) to the frontend public assets directory for use throughout the application.
Copy the second variant of the uploaded brand logo to the frontend public assets directory.
Copy the third variant of the uploaded brand logo to the frontend public assets directory.
Update the favicon link to reference the Narie brand logo. Add appropriate sizes and ensure the logo appears correctly in browser tabs and bookmarks.
Integrate the Narie logo image in the header navigation. Display the logo image next to or in place of the text brand name. Ensure proper sizing, alignment, and responsive behavior.
Incorporate the Narie brand logo in the hero section, ensuring it complements the floral elegance theme and maintains visual hierarchy with the heading and tagline.

requirements.summary: Update hero section heading to align with Narie brand and floral elegance theme
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section heading reflects the Narie brand and floral elegance theme
The heading typography maintains the elegant, refined aesthetic
The heading complements the 'Elegance in Floral' motto

file_operations.description: Replace the hero section heading 'Timeless Elegance' with a new heading that reflects the Narie brand identity and 'Elegance in Floral' motto. Consider headings like 'Narie: Where Elegance Blooms' or similar that emphasize the floral elegance theme. Maintain elegant, refined typography.

requirements.summary: Refine visual theme with floral elegance colors: gold tones, teal accents, cream background
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette includes gold/golden tones and teal accents inspired by the logo
The cream/beige background from the logo informs the overall color scheme
Typography and spacing convey botanical elegance
The design feels cohesive with the floral motif theme

file_operations.description: Reference the generated hero banner background image (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-floral.dim_1920x800.png) featuring soft floral motifs in gold and teal on a cream background. This image will be integrated into the hero section to establish the floral elegance theme.

Update the hero section background image to use the generated floral hero banner (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-floral.dim_1920x800.png). Ensure the image displays elegantly with appropriate overlay and gradient to maintain text readability while showcasing the floral motifs.

Refine the OKLCH color system to incorporate gold tones (warm yellow-gold hues), teal accents (blue-green tones), and cream/beige backgrounds inspired by the Narie logo. Adjust the existing warm earth tone palette to emphasize botanical sophistication. Update CSS custom properties for primary, secondary, and accent colors to reflect the floral elegance theme.

Extend the Tailwind theme with custom colors for gold tones, teal accents, and cream backgrounds. Add color variables that align with the Narie brand identity and floral elegance motif. Ensure the custom colors integrate seamlessly with the existing warm earth tone system.
